ğŸ“– **Available commands:**

/chatty-reset âœ Reset your memory
/chatty-info âœ Show bot info
/chatty-help âœ Show this help message

admin_help_message:
ğŸ“– **Admin Dashboard Commands (DM Only)**
/chatty-admin-model âœ Change active Gemini model
/chatty-admin-models âœ List all available models
/chatty-admin-context âœ Set context file for this server
